text: Jason Green (better known as Planet Asia; born October 24, 1976) is an American rapper. He is known for being part of the hip hop duo Cali Agents. He is also well known for producing many mixtapes. He was with Interscope Records. However, he was not promoted like more popular Interscope rappers 50 Cent and Eminem. He was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2002 for the song "W" by Mystic. He was born Jason Green in Fresno, California. ==References== Category:Rappers from California Category:African-American rappers Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Fresno, California
title: Planet Asia
